messages.content: On June 8th you have the opportunity to elect James Gibson-Watt, a hard-working local campaigner with a record of getting things done, who will work closely with Kirsty Williams AM for the people of Brecon and Radnorshire.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: James Gibson-Watt and Kirsty Williams are a team that will stand up for and fight for the interests of local people.

mentions.candidate: James Gibson-Watt and his family run a high street retail business. He lives in the South-East of Radnorshire and his children all attend local schools. James is the County Councillor for Glasbury and has a long record of achieving great results.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: The Conservatives have not worked for Brecon and Radnorshire.
mentions.partyLeader: Kirsty Williams has represented Brecon & Radnorshire in the Welsh Assembly since 1999.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Only James Gibson-Watt can beat the Conservatives in Brecon & Radnorshire

issues.brexitEurope: As the uncertain process of leaving the European Union continues Brecon and Radnorshire needs a team to look out for its interests.
issues.economy: Business, farming, and tourism industries cannot afford to come out of the Single Market. Hard-working families cannot afford to keep up with increasing bills as the price of food continues to go up.
issues.education: In recent years she has introduced a policy to support rural schools, secured more funding for rural Councils, and passed a law facilitating a more inclusive education system.
issues.government: Brecon and Radnorshire needs more than a yes man.
issues.labourEmployment: In recent years she has introduced a policy to support rural schools, secured more funding for rural Councils, and passed a law facilitating a more inclusive education system.

community.content: James Gibson-Watt and Kirsty Williams will work as a team to fight for Brecon & Radnorshire in these challenging times. This is a team who work tirelessly on behalf of their communities.

leaflet.personalStatement: James Gibson-Watt and Kirsty Williams are a team who will get results.

politicalExperience.achievements: Long record of achieving great results

politicalExperience.role: Represented Brecon & Radnorshire in the Welsh Assembly
